mapper.delete: DELETE FROM guestbook WHERE no = #{no} AND password = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT no, name, password, content, reg_date "date" FROM(SELECT rownum rn, no, name, password, content, reg_date FROM (SELECT no, name, password, content, reg_date FROM guestbook ORDER BY reg_date DESC) ORDER BY rn ASC) WHERE (#{page} - 1) * 5 < rn AND rn <= #{page} * 5
